title: Galle – Matara Road blocked by protest against delayed gas supply
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro gas consumers are still forced to wait in line for many hours simply to purchase a domestic gas cylinder.
This is in a backdrop where Litro said it released 100,000 Cooking Gas cylinders daily over the weekend.
In Galle, a heated situation arose when people lost their patience after waiting in gas for days.
They obstructed the Galle – Matara main road from the Samudra Mawatha and engaged in the protest.
Galle – Matara Road blocked by protest against delayed gas supply
Another Sri Lankan dies in fuel queue; 5th such death so far
